text: Nilokheri railway station is a station on the Delhi-Kalka line. It is located in the Indian state of Haryana. It serves Nilokheri and surrounding area ==The railway station== Nilokheri railway station is located at an altitude of above mean sea level. It was allotted the railway code of NLKR under the jurisdiction of Delhi railway division.http://indiarailinfo.com/arrivals/nilokheri-nlkr/667 ==History== The Delhi-Ambala-Kalka line was opened in 1891. ==References== Karnal Category:Delhi railway division Category:Nilokheri
title: Nilokheri railway station
